org.jcvi.jillion.internal.core.io

Class RandomAccessFileInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • org.jcvi.jillion.internal.core.io.RandomAccessFileInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public final class RandomAccessFileInputStream
extends InputStream
    RandomAccessFileInputStream wraps the given RandomAccessFile in an InputStream. The RandomAccessFile may have its position adjusted via RandomAccessFile.seek(long) by external clients.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomAccessFileInputStream(File file, long startOffset)
      Creates a new RandomAccessFileInputStream of the given file starting at the given position.
      RandomAccessFileInputStream(File file, long startOffset, long length)
      Creates a new RandomAccessFileInputStream of the given file starting at the given position but will only read the given length.
      RandomAccessFileInputStream(RandomAccessFile file)
      Creates a new RandomAccessFileInputStream that reads bytes from the given RandomAccessFile.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      If this instance was creating using the RandomAccessFileInputStream(RandomAccessFile) constructor, then this method does nothing- the RandomAccessFile will still be open.
      int read() 
      int read(byte[] b, int off, int len)

    • Constructor Detail

      • RandomAccessFileInputStream

        public RandomAccessFileInputStream(File file,
                                   long startOffset)
                            throws IOException
        Creates a new RandomAccessFileInputStream of the given file starting at the given position. Internally, a new RandomAccessFile is created and is seek'ed to the given startOffset before reading any bytes. The internal RandomAccessFile instance is managed by this class and will be closed when close() is called.
        Parameters:
        file - the File to read.
        startOffset - the start offset to start reading bytes from.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the given file does not exist
        IllegalArgumentException - if the startOffset is less than 0.

      • RandomAccessFileInputStream

        public RandomAccessFileInputStream(File file,
                                   long startOffset,
                                   long length)
                            throws IOException
        Creates a new RandomAccessFileInputStream of the given file starting at the given position but will only read the given length. Internally, a new RandomAccessFile is created and is seek'ed to the given startOffset before reading any bytes. The internal RandomAccessFile instance is managed by this class and will be closed when close() is called.
        Parameters:
        file - the File to read.
        startOffset - the start offset to start reading bytes from.
        length - the maximum number of bytes to read from the file. this inputStream will only as many bytes are in the file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the given file does not exist
        IllegalArgumentException - if either startOffset or length are less than 0 or if startOffset < file.length().

      • RandomAccessFileInputStream

        public RandomAccessFileInputStream(RandomAccessFile file)
        Creates a new RandomAccessFileInputStream that reads bytes from the given RandomAccessFile. Any external changes to the file pointer via RandomAccessFile.seek(long) or similar methods will also alter the subsequent bytes read by this InputStream. Closing the inputStream returned by this constructor DOES NOT close the RandomAccessFile which must be closed separately by the caller.
        Parameters:
        file - the RandomAccessFile instance to read as an InputStream; can not be null.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if file is null.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        If this instance was creating using the RandomAccessFileInputStream(RandomAccessFile) constructor, then this method does nothing- the RandomAccessFile will still be open. If constructed using RandomAccessFileInputStream(File, long) or RandomAccessFileInputStream(File, long, long), then the internal RandomAccessFile will be closed.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Overrides:
        close in class InputStream
        Throws:
        IOException
